# DARWHIN GOMEZ

New York, New York | 347-491-2955 | Darwhin88@gmail.com  
[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin) | [GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)

## EDUCATION
**City University of New York**  
Master of Science in Data Science and Machine Learning, Expected Jan 2026  
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Information Systems, GPA: 3.78, Jun 2024  
Dean’s List (5x), National Honor Society

## EXPERIENCE
### Software Developer Intern  
**WOPLLI Technologies** | Remote, NY  
Jun 2024 – Sep 2024  
- Designed a Virtual Credential System for decentralized identity ecosystems.  
- Configured and tested Azure environments for application hosting and deployment.  
- Developed API integration and testing scripts using Postman.  
- Created technical documentation, including data flow diagrams.

### IT Support Intern  
**Mayor’s Office of Information Services** | New York, NY  
Feb 2024 – May 2024  
- Automated troubleshooting with Python scripts, reducing manual workload.  
- Monitored logs and security dashboards to identify abnormal activities.  
- Supported VIP users, ensuring secure system access (Active Directory, VPN).  
- Restored out-of-commission devices through hardware and software updates.

### IT Instructor Assistant  
**RF CUNY & Generation USA (Choose-U)** | Remote, NY  
Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Delivered 36 lessons on IT support, Linux, PowerShell, and scripting for 200+ learners.  
- Achieved a 96% cohort graduation rate through data-driven instruction.  
- Developed comprehensive testing materials to assess student progress.

## PROJECTS
### Financial Stocks Report Webpage  
- Developed a dynamic stock reporting web app using PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.  
- Optimized query execution for a 65,000+ record database, ensuring fast load times.

### EZ-Rental Auto Rental POS System Database  
- Designed and implemented an MSSQL relational database with normalized tables.  
- Developed ERD models and proof-of-concepts to align with business requirements.

### Forecasting ATM Cash Demand Using Time Series Models  
- Built ARIMA-based time series models in R to predict ATM cash demand.

### Unsupervised Anomaly Detection in Bank Transactions  
- Developed an Isolation Forest model in Python to detect anomalies in bank transaction data.

## CORE SKILLS
- **Programming Languages:** Python, SQL, R  
- **Data Science & ML:** Statistical Modeling, Forecasting, Anomaly Detection  
- **Databases:** MSSQL, MySQL, NoSQL  
- **Tools & Frameworks:** Git, Docker, Power BI  
- **Languages:** English (Fluent), Spanish (Fluent)
